mapper.insert: insert into board(subject, count, writer, content, reg_date, user_ip) values(#{subject},0,#{writer},#{content},now(),#{user_ip})
mapper.update: update board set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} where no=#{no}
mapper.select: select * from board order by no desc
mapper.insert: insert into reply(board_no, content, writer, reg_date)values(#{board_no} , #{content}, #{writer}, now())
mapper.update: update board set count=count+1 where no=#{no}
